means: 锡拉库扎（意大利西西里岛东部一港市）

sentence.Network_en: On the strength of those grades, he won a scholarship to Syracuse University.
sentence.Network_cn: 凭借那些成绩，他赢得了锡拉丘兹大学的奖学金。

sentence.Network_en: Tom is from the town of Syracuse, New York.
Later I took my law degree at Syracuse.
sentence.Network_cn: 后来,我获得锡拉丘兹大学的法学学位.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 图文锡拉库萨(Syracuse)是意大利西西里岛上的一座城市,又译叙拉古,位于岛的东岸,约有12.5万居民。面积204平方公里。 .西塞罗称锡拉库萨为“古代世界最美丽的城市”.
syr 糖浆, syracuse 敍拉古, syracusa 西拉库萨

list.abs: beijing to syracuse international ticket prices ., 北京到锡拉丘兹特价机票价格.
锡拉丘兹大学(Syracuse University)在美国大学排名2012为第62名。www.syr.edu/ 本科申请及录取 International Admissions Condition…
中国教育学会培训中心 ... 密歇根州立大学 Michigan State Unive 雪城大学 Syracuse University 詹姆斯库克大学 James Cook.

means.word_mean: 1. a city in central New York
2. a city in southeastern Sicily that was founded by Corinthians in the 8th century BC
3. the Roman siege of Syracuse (214-212 BC) was eventually won by the Romans who sacked the city (killing Archimedes)
4. the Athenian siege of Syracuse (415-413 BC) was eventually won by Syracuse
